name: Block Blitz: A Grid Puzzle Game
name_original: Block Blitz: A Grid Puzzle Game
description:
Block Blitz is an addictive puzzle game that you can play anytime and anywhere!

How to play:
1. Fill the grid with blocks
2. Through horizontal or vertical to get points
3. Challenge your friends!

Features:
*Easy to learn and play
*Colorful design suitable for all ages
*Light Mode & Dark Mode for eye-protection

Get it & make your record!
